name: Advance token to the nearest Utility.
description: If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a total 10 (ten) times the amount thrown.

name: Advance to the nearest Railroad.
description: If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, pay owner twice the rent to which they are otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

name: Advance to the nearest Railroad.
description: If unowned, you may buy it from the Bank. If owned, pay owner twice the rent to which they are otherwise entitled. If Railroad is unowned, you may buy it from the Bank.

name: Get out of Jail Free.
description: This card may be kept until needed, or traded/sold.

name: Go to Jail.
description: Go directly to Jail. Do not pass GO, do not collect $200.

name: Make general repairs on all your property:
description: For each house pay $25, For each hotel $100.

name: Take a trip to Reading Railroad.
Take a walk on the Boardwalk.
You have been elected Chairman of the Board.
